languages.text: "Пока ты со мной, Глейто, я вынесу что угодно. И мне больше никто не нужен — никто".
"As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."
languages.original_text: "Пока ты со мной, Глейто, я вынесу что угодно. И мне больше никто не нужен — никто".

traits.locale_text: "As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."
"As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."
"As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."
"As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."
"As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."

languages.text: "Solange du bei mir bist, Glaito, kann ich alles ertragen. Und sonst brauche ich niemanden – niemanden."
languages.original_text: "As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."

traits.locale_text: "Solange du bei mir bist, Glaito, kann ich alles ertragen. Und sonst brauche ich niemanden – niemanden."

languages.text: « Tant que tu es à mes côtés, Glaito, je peux tout endurer. Je n'ai besoin de personne d'autre... »
languages.original_text: "As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."

traits.locale_text: « Tant que tu es à mes côtés, Glaito, je peux tout endurer. Je n'ai besoin de personne d'autre... »

languages.text: “只要有你陪在我身边，格雷托，我什么都能忍受。我不需要别人，谁都不需要。”
languages.original_text: "As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."

traits.locale_text: “只要有你陪在我身边，格雷托，我什么都能忍受。我不需要别人，谁都不需要。”

languages.text: «Mientras estés a mi lado, Glaito, puedo soportar lo que sea necesario. Y no necesito a nadie más. A nadie».
languages.original_text: "As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras estés a mi lado, Glaito, puedo soportar lo que sea necesario. Y no necesito a nadie más. A nadie».

languages.text: 「グライト。お前がそばにいる限り、何だって耐えられる。だから他の誰も必要ない…誰も」
languages.original_text: "As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."

traits.locale_text: 「グライト。お前がそばにいる限り、何だって耐えられる。だから他の誰も必要ない…誰も」

languages.text: "Benimle olduğun sürece her şeye dayanırım Glaito. Kimseye... Hiç kimseye ihtiyacım yok."
languages.original_text: "As long as you're with me, Glaito, I can endure anything. And I don't need anyone else — no one."

traits.locale_text: "Benimle olduğun sürece her şeye dayanırım Glaito. Kimseye... Hiç kimseye ihtiyacım yok."
